unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Jadeja's knee? Hope he's recovering well after that injury at Chinnaswamy. Dr. Sharma said a few weeks, right? Heard they're building a new rehab facility, like 5000 sq ft, near the NCA in Bangalore. Rs. crores are being spent! Wishing him a speedy recovery, maybe back for the next Ranji Trophy? #GetWellSoonJadeja
